name: Eventbrite Trigger
natural_language_description: 这是 Eventbrite Trigger 节点。主要用于: Handle Eventbrite events via webhooks

authentication.name: authentication
authentication.natural_language_description: 参数名: Authentication | 默认值: privateKey

organization.name: organization
organization.description: The Eventbrite Organization to work on. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
organization.natural_language_description: 参数名: Organization Name or ID | 作用: The Eventbrite Organization to work on. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression. | (必填项)

event.name: event
event.description: Limit the triggers to this event. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
event.natural_language_description: 参数名: Event Name or ID | 作用: Limit the triggers to this event. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression. | (必填项)

actions.name: actions
actions.description: One or more action to subscribe to
actions.natural_language_description: 参数名: Actions | 作用: One or more action to subscribe to | 默认值: [] | (必填项)

resolveData.name: resolveData
resolveData.description: By default does the webhook-data only contain the URL to receive the object data manually. If this option gets activated, it will resolve the data automatically.
resolveData.natural_language_description: 参数名: Resolve Data | 作用: By default does the webhook-data only contain the URL to receive the object data manually. If this option gets activated, it will resolve the data automatically. | 默认值: True
